Vonani Bila bụ onye edemede na onye na-ede abụ na South Afrika, a mụrụ ya n'afọ 1972 na Obodo Shirley  dị nso na Ụlọ ọgwụ Elim
Ọ bụ onye guzobere na onye nchịkọta akụkọ nke akwụkwọ akụkọ abụ Timbila ma na-eduzi Timbila Poetry Project na Shirley Village, Elim na Limpopo Province
Ọ na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye nhazi nke Limpopo NGO Coalition ma na-edezi akwụkwọ akụkọ Community Gazette
O dere akwụkwọ akụkọ asatọ n'asụsụ Bekee na Tsonga maka ndị okenye na-agụ akwụkwọ ọhụrụ
E bipụtara abụ ya na nchịkọta "No Free Sleeping"
N'afọ 2003, Vonani Bila wepụtara CD egwu na abụ mbụ ya, 'Dahl Street, Pietersburg'
Bila sonyere na 'Poetry Africa 2005', emume mba ụwa nke uri nke emere na Durban, South Africa.

Vonani Bila malitere agụmakwụkwọ ya na Shirley Primary School n'obodo ya bụ Shirley, ọ gara n'igụ  agụmakwụkwọ sekọndrị ya na Ụlọ akwụkwọ Lemana High na  obodo Njhakanjhaka Village dị nso na Elim Hospital
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndrị Lemana, ọ gara Mahadum Natal
O nwere MA na Creative Writing na Mahadum Rhodes
